PerfectNetExp.abs: (Wave Propagation)、溢洪道(Spillway)和过水闸门 (SluiceGate)、润滑(Lubrication)、金属的铸造和熔焊(Casting and Welting)、玻璃(Glass)和塑料(Plastic),以及石油.
